title: IndusTrack Introduced Unique Fleet Management and Mobile Workforce Management Solution: “One Source” Platform
text:
Snow Removal And all other types of businesses that have a mobile workforce in the field. 
IndusTrack spokesperson elaborated problems field managers have to deal with that arise due to the use of multiple software for tracking and workforce management or paper based process, he said: “As your business begins to gradually develop and grow larger there are often areas that may inadvertently be left behind. With a growing employee base it can often be difficult to know who is doing what, where, when and for how long.” 
He further added: “Paper-based data collection is risky business, especially when it comes to billing and payrolls, but many companies have tried effortlessly in order to resolve these issues in the form of GPS tracking systems. Businesses are still choosing to spend time and money micro-managing their staff using telephone and documented communication, which can cost your company hundreds or even thousands each year.” 
The newly developed and distinctive system will easily integrate itself with a field service company's current CRM or accounting software with no confusing options, difficult programming or costly training. The system will provide GPS tracking of fleet or mobile workforce, high value assets, time cap logs, schedules and form submissions. "One Source" Platform system will work on any form of IOS, Android or Windows tablet or smartphone. 
About: In 2008, IndusTrack was created by a deeply experienced team brought together by Raz Bajwa to address market challenges with tracking fleet and mobile workers. Based upon their breadth of knowledge in this space, they have been able to build a unique solution that offers tracking, scheduling, routing, dispatching, messaging, and work orders all in one unique package. IndusTrack stands behind their product 100% and can assure you the very best value in the marketplace today. For more information, please visit: http://www.industrack.com/
